type: Plumber, apprentice plumber Service & Welder Service
description: This requirement is for: The Correctional Service of Canada, Quebec Region
full_summary:
================

**Title/Titre**: Plumber, Apprentice Plumber Service and Welder Service

**Reference Number/Numéro de Reference**: cb-8203-78930922
**Amendment Number/Numéro de Modification**: 5
**Solicitation Number/Numéro de Sollicitation**: 21301-24-4476322

**Publication Date/Dates de Publication**: 2023-08-16
**Tender Closing Date/Fermeture des offres**: 2023-09-25T14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date/Lieu d'application et Date de début du contrat**: 2023-10-01
**Expected Contract End Date/Lieu d'application et Date de fin du contrat**: 2025-05-31

**Tender Status/Statut des offres**: Expired

**Description of Goods and Services/Déscription des biens et services**:

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide plumbing, apprentice plumber service, and welder service for various correctional institutions and complexes in the Quebec region.

The contractor will be required to provide a qualified workforce, tools, equipment, materials (when requested by CSC), and disposal services to perform plumbing, maintenance, replacement, modification, and addition of new components to the network plumbing facilities.

**Objectives/Objectifs**: To provide plumbing, apprentice plumber service, and welder service for various correctional institutions and complexes in the Quebec region.

**Deliverables/Livrables**:

* Provide plumbing, apprentice plumber service, and welder service for various correctional institutions and complexes in the Quebec region.
* Meet the requirements for all the institutions and complexes for which the contractor is bidding.

**Trade Agreement/Entente commerciale**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

**Procurement Method/Méthode d'approvisionnement**: Competitive - Open bidding.

**Evaluation Criteria/Critères d'évaluation**: Lowest Price.

**Notes to Bidders/Avis aux soumissionnaires**: Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys/tenders opportunities website.

**Contact Information/Informations de contact**:

* Name: Kim Lavallée
* Email: kim
